ygData.subject: RE: Rules and FAQ 1.7 - PLEASE READ THIS!
ygData.msgSnippet: you have The Maestro s Lute under special instruments.  Kelin s Seven Stringed Lute IS the lute off maestro.  and i think we came up with 20% as the increase.
ygData.messageBody:
you have The Maestro's Lute under special instruments. Kelin's Seven
Stringed Lute IS the lute off maestro. and i think we came up with 20% as
the increase. we had some debate about how much we heal at 50 with a normal
lute sitting.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L36 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> Q: Are there any magical or "Unique" instruments for Bards?

> A: Yes, there are several known "special" instruments in the world.
> *(New)* The Maestro's Lute (Found in the Plane of Fear), which
> increases the effects of most stringed songs by 15%.

> > Kelin's Seven Stringed Lute which adds +9 DEX, +15 CHAR, +9
> AGI. It also seems to add about 15-20% to stringed songs.
> Found on the
> Maestro of Rancor in the Plane of Hate.
